title: 056 - Bring Back Bags Of Snyder Of Berlin BBQ Chips STAT
description: On today's show, the guys discuss which discontinued snacks they'd like to see hit the shelves again, chat about some new things that are coming to Netflix and some shows they plan on catching up on over the long weekend, and go through a new Folder of Death which includes questions like which beverages they would have come out of their fingers if they could only drink 5 different liquids for the rest of their lives, they share a couple of stories about being reckless driving, chat about which meals make you feel like a scumbag for eating them, how much money they would need to go deaf/blind respectively, and go everywhere else the conversation takes them as this one gets off the rails a bit. Have a safe and fun holiday weekend, and enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
